creditline: Gift of Judith Kaufer and Katherine Kaufer Christoffel in memory of their parents, George and Sonya Kaufer
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: miniature totem pole; white with touches of black for eyes of animals and brown snout on polar bear at top; animals depicted, from bottom: walrus, beluga whale, seal and polar bear; greenish-grey rectangular stone base
markings: on underside of base, on sticker: 41
title: Animal totem
